Review Text: overall stay was good. The room is very spacious and comfortable.  The location is A+, beautiful ocean view. I love the breakfast the most, front office staff was not very friendly, needs proper training

Review Title: I was not wowed like I expected I'd be.
Review Text: The check-in took time. I wasn't very impressed with the room because I was greeted with damp smell and the rug in the room looked worn out. those tiny ants were all over my desert before morning. they need to fumigate. I expected more actually. But I did enjoyed my sleep and I loved the atmosphere at the hotel, the lagoon side was very beautiful. security was excellent and staff were very helpful and professional

Review Title: Business Trip with wonderful Food , Service  and accommodation from Radison Group
Review Text: The Radisson Blu Anchorage is a fantastic hotel centrally located with a classic HOLIDAY Atmosphere for business trips . The service and professional friendly service is simply amazing , together with their wonderful breakfast

Review Text: I enjoyed myself and generally had a wonderful stay in Radisson Blu. I am looking forward to spending time there again with members of my family. I especially liked their morning buffet, but they need to improve food on menu for afternoon buffets. Overall, it is an excellent hotel with good ambience and other offerings

Review Text: The experience was a great one, liked the location close to the water, excellent dinning facilities and food, beautiful rooms but i think the rug should be eliminated cos they are getting old rather i recommend parquet floors and most importantly i think your rooms are over priced during weekdays. Consider price reduction to increase patronage and clientele base. All the same i enjoyed my stay at your hotel and looking forward to another stay if the prices are more competitive.
